azurerm_hpc_cache_nfs_target.description: Manages a NFS Target within a HPC Cache.

name.description: The name of the HPC Cache NFS Target. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which to create the HPC Cache NFS Target. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

cache_name.description: The name HPC Cache, which the HPC Cache NFS Target will be added to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

target_host_name.description: The IP address or fully qualified domain name (FQDN

usage_model.description: The type of usage of the HPC Cache NFS Target.

namespace_junction.description: Can be specified multiple times to define multiple `namespace_junction`. Each `namespace_juntion` block supports fields documented below.

namespace_path.description: The client-facing file path of this NFS target within the HPC Cache NFS Target.

nfs_export.description: The NFS export of this NFS target within the HPC Cache NFS Target.

target_path.description: The relative subdirectory path from the `nfs_export` to map to the `namespace_path`. Defaults to `""`, in which case the whole `nfs_export` is exported.

id.description: The ID of the HPC Cache NFS Target.

create.description: Used when creating the HPC Cache NFS Target.

read.description: Used when retrieving the HPC Cache NFS Target.

update.description: Used when updating the HPC Cache NFS Target.

delete.description: Used when deleting the HPC Cache NFS Target.
